text.text_translated: I think it's fascinating to consider how we can speed up our **evolution**, which is the way living things change and develop over a long time, by making our bodies better. Soon we will be able to put a computer inside our brain. This will make our maths skills, seeing and hearing, and memory better. This idea will then become more and more usual.
